Title: Master bedroom with ensuite - large walk-up apartment
Location: 400 River Valley RoadRiver Valley, Central Singapore
Description:
'1. Rental SGD 1,900 (incl. of weekly cleaning services in common areas and bathrooms). Master Room with a spacious en suite bathroom.  
2. Utility and WIFI are paid separately, typically SGD 100 per person
3. Flatshare with two other working adults, women who are in the arts and FnB sector. 
4. The apartment has a kitchen equipped with oven, 2 cooking hobs, an air fryer and a microwave. Perfect for those who love meal prepping or baking!
5. Less than 2 mins walk to 3 bus stops and the new Great World MRT. 15 mins walk to ION Orchard.'
